author: Ainsley Harriott
method: In a blender, mix the passata, spring onions, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, Tabasco sauce and ice cubes. Blend for two minutes, or until smooth. Pour into a tall glass and garnish with chopped chives.
ingredients: 200ml/7fl oz tomato passata,  2 spring onions, finely chopped,  1 lemon, juiced,  ½ tsp Tabasco sauce,  ½ tsp Worcestershire sauce,  55g/2oz ice cubes ,  1 tbsp chives, chopped
